channel.title: Linux, Software and play
channel.description: A blog about all kinds of things concerning software and Linux

item.title: Contact - How to contact me
item.description:
If you want to contact me, please send an email to: florian.brandes@gmx.de.

My GPG key can be found on the current keyservers.

The key ID currently in use is: 7A04C449

My fingerprint is: F6DE 62EB D6BB 31E0 1803 95B8 A7F7 307B 7A04 C449

item.title: First post
item.description:
This is the first Test using bashblog Markdown

Ok so, lets see how it looks.
